name: How To Confuse An Idiot
description:
This is a game to test how much of an idiot you are.

New Update:

  • The Game now has music
  • There is a game over screen as well as a sound effect
  • I made some changes to the main menu as well as the game over screens
  • It now has a visible Difficulty Counter

This Game is not meant to hurt any feelings, I thought this would be a fun idea 

Please leave a comment of how you did and your thoughts on the game in general.

Thanks =)
